name: disgustingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel extreme dislike or disapproval: This strikes me as disgustingly hypocritical. He's been treated disgustingly.
humorous in a way that makes you feel annoyed because someone has something, especially a quality, that you would like to have: They're all disgustingly young and healthy. See
disgusting
More examplesFewer examplesAfter they've been drinking for a while they start behaving disgustingly.The film is disgustingly exploitative.The room was disgustingly dirty.Disgustingly, not one person stopped to help.He's disgustingly talented.
